items.title: Price predictions 2/25: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, BCH, ADA, HYPE, XMR
items.summary: Bitcoin bulls rushed toward $70,000, and ETH reclaimed $2,000 following a drastic improvement in investor sentiment, but will the gains hold?

items.title: MrBeast editor nabbed by prediction market firm Kalshi for alleged insider trading
items.summary: The company said it punished the MrBeast employee and another user it said tried to get away with contracts relying on inside information.

items.title: Hut 8 swings to Q4 loss; compute revenue contribution increases
items.summary: The Bitcoin miner's digital asset losses mounted, even as it advanced a 15-year, $7 billion AI data center lease.

items.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana Shorts Get Rekt as BTC Price Rebounds Near $69K
items.summary: More than $400 million worth of short positions have been liquidated in the last day as Bitcoin nears $69K and Ethereum and Solana surge.

items.title: Bitcoin tops $69.5K after stock market rebound, strong earnings data boost risk appetite
items.summary: Bitcoin rallied above $69,500 after US stocks turned green on US policy clarity and strong earnings results. Will bulls target $70,000 next?

items.title: What early Bitcoin architect Adam Back thinks of this cycle
items.summary: Cited in the 2008 Bitcoin white paper, Back argued volatility is typical even as regulatory clarity and institutional access expands.

items.title: Blockfills co-founder and CEO Nicholas Hammer has stepped down
items.summary: The crypto lender suspended client deposits and withdrawals earlier this month due to recent market and financial conditions.

items.title: The UK is picking winners for its digital dollar future while Coinbase CEO cries foul
items.summary: Coinciding with the FCA‚Äôs announcement of its stablecoin trial, Coinbase‚Äôs Brian Armstrong criticized the U.K.‚Äôs regulatory process, saying it puts the region's global crypto leadership at risk.

items.title: Bitcoin Giant Strategy, Coinbase Among Most-Shorted Stocks: Goldman Sachs
items.summary: Top crypto equities like Bitcoin treasury firm Strategy and crypto exchange Coinbase are among the most shorted stocks, says Goldman Sachs.

items.title: Tether invests $200 million in digital marketplace Whop to expand stablecoin payments
items.summary: The online marketplace said it will embed Tether's crypto wallet tools and USDT, USAT tokens to power crypto payments for over 18 million users.

items.title: UK Selects Firms for Stablecoin Regulatory Sandbox, Including Revolut
items.summary: The four firms will now have free reign to experiment in a program that will inform final UK stablecoin rules set to be released later this year.

items.title: Crypto Long & Short: When ETF options start driving bitcoin
items.summary: In this week‚Äôs Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Gregory Mall of Lionsoul Global on how ETFs have shifted a growing share of bitcoin volatility into U.S. equity options markets.

items.title: A $100 million crypto campaign fund with a pro-Trump vibe so far failed to show up
items.summary: The Fellowship political action committee promised $100 million, with reports that Tether may have been tied as a backer, but the fund has so far delivered zero.

items.title: Tokenized US Treasurys rise by over $1B since start of 2026
items.summary: The tokenized US Treasury market had a market capitalization of under $4 billion at the start of 2025 and has been gradually rising.

items.summary: WebN backed innovative digital asset firms like KAIO, Twinstake, TruFin and Geometry.

items.title: Solana leads crypto recovery with 10% gain: Is $100 SOL price next?

items.title: Circle beats Q4 earnings estimates as USDC supply jumps 72%; shares surge 20%

items.title: Bitcoin treasury firm GD Culture set to sell BTC holdings to fund share buybacks

items.title: The Ethereum Foundation's Commitment to DeFi
items.summary: DeFi isn't a speculative bet on the future. It's the inevitable evolution of finance, driven by a fundamental truth: financial autonomy is a right, not a privilege. And it's been a critical driver of Ethereum's growth and adoption. We want‚Ä¶
